text: Mario Armando Lavandeira, Jr. (born March 23, 1978), known as Perez Hilton, is an American blogger and television presenter. He writes and gossips about musicians, actors and celebrities. His name is a play on the name "Paris Hilton".Perez Hilton - The Hollywood Gossip Hilton was born in Miami to Cuban parents. He was a housemate in the January 2015 series of Celebrity Big Brother (UK). ==Personal life== Hilton is openly gay.Perez Hilton pledges to stop bullying celebrities Hilton is a Democrat and attended the 2012 Democratic National Convention in support of President Obama's re-election. ==References== ==Other websites== *Perez Hilton's Official website Category:Celebrity Big Brother contestants Category:Democrats (United States) Category:Gay men Category:LGBT people from Florida Category:American LGBT writers Category:Writers from Miami Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American Internet celebrities Category:American bloggers
